TopicTitle: Mod with a BIG launch tower ?

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod out there that adds a real big launch tower with multiple connections to the rocket ?

Like this one:

you can try FASA Launch Towers

Link edit

about the multiple connections you can just add the small towers inside the big one and it should work

i didn't test that
thanks, somehow i missed the smaller towers from FASA to be added

Hopefully in the not too distant future there will be some Russian launch towers available, but Raidernick has said they are a low priority at the moment

Bumping this thread up for my own related request:

What I would like to see are some "clean" launch towers, sort of like what Atlas V uses at KSC. Can the stock structures be modified in any way? I wouldn't mind something like this be a part of the launchpad by default and not as a separate part...
